title: N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 15 ยง 19.9 - Notification as to litigation
content:
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 15 ยง 19.9 - Notification as to litigation

State Regulations

The Commissioner of Motor Vehicles shall promptly notify
the corporation counsel of the city of New York, and the commissioner of
finance shall promptly notify the deputy commissioner and counsel of the

Department of Motor Vehicles, of any litigation instituted against either party
which challenges the constitutionality or validity of the local law imposing
the tax or of the enabling act pursuant to which it was adopted or which
attempts to limit or question the applicability of either such law, and such
notification shall include a copy of the papers served upon either
party. Notes
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 15
ยง
19.9

State regulations are updated quarterly; we currently have two versions available. Below is a
comparison between our most recent version and the prior quarterly release. More comparison features will be added as we have more versions to compare. No prior version found.
